resources.string:
Step ① Type in the number that you want it in words.
 Step ② Number in words is generated on your key clicks.
 Step ③ Copy the number in words by clicking on COPY Text button.
 Step ④ Paste it where you want.

Note : You can share the number in words text to social media. :)

This App help you convert the number to text, which can then be used in inputting on bank cheques.
